## Why Agents Beat Zero-Shot Prompts at Seer Equity

### The Business Problem

Seer Equity's loan officers have been using AI chatbots for months, and the reviews are... mixed.

*"I asked it about a client's loan status and it told me how to log into our system. I know how to log in! I wanted the actual status."*

*"It gave me great advice on updating loan records, but it can't actually update them. I still have to do everything manually."*

The chatbots are helpful for general questions, but they can't access Seer Equity's data or take action. They explain processes without executing them.

### What You'll Learn

In this lab, you'll directly compare three approaches to understand why agents are transforming how work gets done:

| Approach | Can Access Data | Can Modify Data | Can Coordinate |
|----------|-----------------|-----------------|----------------|
| **SELECT AI CHAT** (zero-shot) | No | No | No |
| **SELECT AI** | Yes | No | No |
| **SELECT AI AGENT** | Yes | Yes | Yes |

You'll ask the same question about loan applications to each approach and see the dramatic difference.

**What you'll build:** A comparison showing exactly when to use each approach.

**Estimated Time:** 10 minutes

## Set Your AI Profile

First, activate your AI profile for the zero-shot and SELECT AI comparisons.

msg.data:
Set Your AI Profile

First, activate your AI profile for the zero-shot and SELECT AI comparisons.

paragraphs.text:
%script
EXEC DBMS_CLOUD_AI.SET_PROFILE('genai');

%md
## Try Zero-Shot: Ask a Procedural Question

Zero-shot (SELECT AI CHAT) goes directly to the LLM for general knowledge. Watch what happens when you ask how to process a loan application.

**What you'll see:** A helpful explanation of the steps, but you still have to do each step yourself. The AI advises; it doesn't act.

msg.data:
Try Zero-Shot: Ask a Procedural Question

Zero-shot (SELECT AI CHAT) goes directly to the LLM for general knowledge. Watch what happens when you ask how to process a loan application.

What you'll see: A helpful explanation of the steps, but you still have to do each step yourself. The AI advises; it doesn't act.

paragraphs.text:
%script
SELECT AI CHAT How do I process a loan application at Seer Equity;

%md
## Try Zero-Shot: Ask About YOUR Data

Now try asking about a specific loan application in your system.

**What you'll see:** The AI cannot answer this because it has no access to your data. It gives generic advice about how to check loan status, but it doesn't know anything about YOUR application LOAN-12345.

This is the fundamental limitation of zero-shot: great for general knowledge, useless for your specific business data.

paragraphs.text:
%script
SELECT AI CHAT What is the status of loan application LOAN-12345 at Seer Equity;

%md
## Try Zero-Shot: Ask It to DO Something

What happens when you ask the AI to take action on a loan application?

**What you'll see:** The AI explains HOW to update a loan status but cannot actually do it. Zero-shot can advise; it cannot act.

%md
## Create an Agent That Can Act

Now let's build an agent that can both READ and WRITE. We'll give it two tools: one to look up loans and one to update them.

In this lab, we're using **function-based tools** instead of SQL tools. A function-based tool wraps a PL/SQL function you write, giving you complete control over what the tool does. This is how you give agents the ability to make changes to your data, not just read it.

## Register the Tools

Now we turn these functions into tools the agent can use. The `instruction` tells the agent when and how to use each tool. Notice how we tell the agent to check the loan status before updating—this is how you build smart behavior into your agent.

Now we put it all together. The agent gets a role that tells it how to behave. The task gives it specific instructions and access to both tools. The team makes it all runnable.

Notice how we give the agent access to TWO tools—it can decide which one to use based on what you ask.

## Ask the Agent to Check and Update

Now ask the agent to check the loan application and approve it if it's under review. This requires the agent to:
1. Look up the current status
2. Make a decision based on what it finds

## Test Conditional Logic

Now try the same request on loan application LOAN-12346, which is PENDING (not under review).

**What you'll see:** The agent looks up the application, sees it's PENDING, and correctly decides NOT to update it because the condition ("if it's under review") isn't met.

This is intelligent coordination. The agent makes decisions based on data.

Every tool call is logged. You can see exactly what the agent did.

**What you'll see:** The sequence of tool calls: lookups followed by updates (or just lookups when no update was needed).

paragraphs.text:
%script
SELECT 
    tool_name,
    TO_CHAR(start_date, 'HH24:MI:SS') as called_at,
    SUBSTR(output, 1, 80) as result
FROM USER_AI_AGENT_TOOL_HISTORY
ORDER BY start_date DESC
FETCH FIRST 10 ROWS ONLY;

%md
## The Comparison Summary

| Approach | Can Access Your Data | Can Modify Data | Can Coordinate Steps |
|----------|---------------------|-----------------|----------------------|
| SELECT AI CHAT | No | No | No |
| SELECT AI | Yes | No | No |
| SELECT AI AGENT | Yes | Yes | Yes |

**Use SELECT AI CHAT when:**
- You need general knowledge answers
- No data access required
- You want advice or explanation

**Use SELECT AI when:**
- You need to query your data with natural language
- Read-only access is sufficient

**Use SELECT AI AGENT when:**
- You need to read AND write data
- Decisions depend on data (conditional logic)
- Actions need coordination across multiple steps

## What You Learned

You directly compared three approaches:

- **SELECT AI CHAT**: Cannot access your data; can only give generic advice
- **SELECT AI**: Can read your data but cannot modify it  
- **SELECT AI AGENT**: Can read your data, make decisions, and take action

You watched the agent coordinate: check status → decide → act → report. And you verified the data actually changed.

**Key takeaway:** The difference is not just intelligence. It is action. Zero-shot AI tells you what to do. SELECT AI can read. Agents do the work.
